Sun downing is a common thing among those w dementia; the problem is that they can't make informed consent due to their brains not functioning properly. Yes they could get someone to have power of attorney but then that person would have a lot of control over that persons life in the advancement of the illness plus that'd be a huge burden on someone to have to make that choice. Emotionally that would crush me.
